com.larkwoodlabs.net.udp
Class UdpSocketEndpoint

java.lang.Object
  com.larkwoodlabs.net.udp.UdpSocketEndpoint
All Implemented Interfaces:
DuplexChannel<UdpDatagram>, MessageInput<UdpDatagram>, MessageOutput<UdpDatagram>, UdpEndpoint
public final class UdpSocketEndpoint
extends Object
implements UdpEndpoint

A UdpEndpoint implementation that uses a DatagramChannel to provide transport.

Author:
Gregory Bumgardner (gbumgard)

Closes this channel and optionally closes any channels wrapped or attached to this channel.

receive

public final UdpDatagram receive(int milliseconds)
                          throws IOException
Waits to receive a datagram from the socket.

Specified by:
receive in interface MessageInput<UdpDatagram>
Parameters:
milliseconds - The amount of time to allow for the receive operation to complete.
Returns:
A new UdpDatagram instance. The destination address and port is the one used to construct the end-point and not that of the actual datagram (not available in Java API).
Throws:
IOException - The receive operation failed because there was an IO error, the receive was interrupted or the endpoint was closed.

send

public final void send(UdpDatagram datagram,
                       int milliseconds)
                throws IOException
Sends the datagram payload to the destination addresss and port specified in the datagram.

Specified by:
send in interface MessageOutput<UdpDatagram>
Parameters:
datagram - The UdpDatagram whose payload will be sent.
milliseconds - The amount of time to allow for the send operation to complete. Ignored in this class.
Throws:
IOException - The send operation failed because there was an IO error, the send was interrupted or the endpoint was closed.
